document.docAuthor: Hernández-Orts, Jesús S., Kuchta, Roman, Semenas, Liliana, Crespo, Enrique A., González, Raúl A. & Aznar, Francisco J.
document.masterDocTitle: An annotated list of the Acanthocephala from Argentina

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: An annotated list of the Acanthocephala from Argentina

subSubSection.paragraph:
Cynoscion guatucupa (Cuvier)
( Perciformes , Sciaenidae ). SI: body cavity. SD: cystacanth. L: Buenos Aires Province : Mar del Plata ( 38°08’S , 57°32’W ). R:
Sardella et al. (2005)
,
Timi et al. (2005)
. C: vouchers (MLP-He 5410).

Conger orbignianus Valenciennes
( Anguilliformes , Congridae ). SI: mesenteries. SD: cystacanth. L: Buenos Aires Province : Villa Gesell ( 37°30’S , 56°39’W ). R: Timi and Lanfranchi (2013) .

Dules auriga Cuvier
( Perciformes , Serranidae ). SI: mesenteries. SD: cystacanth. L: Buenos Aires Province : South Argentine-Uruguayan Common Fishing Zone (38º00’– 38º20’S , 56º18’– 57º16’W ), Mar del Plata. R: Braicovich and Timi (2015) .

Micropogonias furnieri (Desmarest)
( Perciformes , Sciaenidae ). SI: unknown. SD: cystacanth. L: Buenos Aires Province : Mar Chiquita Lagoon ( 37°32’S , 57°19’W ). R: Alarcos and Etchegoin (2010) .

Mullus argentinae Hubbs & Marini
( Perciformes , Mullidae ). SI: mesenteries. SD: cystacanth. L: Buenos Aires Province : Mar del Plata ( 38º27’S , 57º90’W). R:
Lanfranchi et al. (2009)
.

Nemadactylus bergi (Norman)
( Perciformes , Cheilodactylidae ). SI: mesenteries. SD: cystacanth. L: Buenos Aires Province : Mar del Plata ( 38°27’S , 57°90’W). R: Rossin and Timi (2010) .

Paralichthys isosceles
Jordan ( Pleuronectiformes , Paralichthyidae ). SI: mesenteries. SD: cystacanth. L: Chubut Province: northern Patagonian shelf (42º45’– 42º59’S , 61º09’– 62º58’W ). R: Hernández-Orts et al. (2019a).

Paralichthys orbignyanus (Valenciennes)
( Pleuronectiformes , Paralichthyidae ). SI: unknown. SD: cystacanth. L: Buenos Aires Province : Mar Chiquita Lagoon ( 37°32’S , 57°19’W ). R: Alarcos and Etchegoin (2010) .

Paralichthys patagonicus
Jordan ( Pleuronectiformes , Paralichthyidae ). SI: mesenteries. SD: cystacanth. L: Buenos Aires Province: Necochea ( 38°52’S , 58°10’W ). R: Alarcos and Timi (2012) .

Percophis brasiliensis Quoy & Gaimard
( Perciformes , Percophidae ). SI: mesenteries. SD: cystacanth. L: Buenos Aires Province : Villa Gesell ( 37°50’S , 56°15’W ), South of the Argentine-Uruguayan Common Fishing Zone ( 38°08’S , 57°32’W ), Mar del Plata ( 38°20’S , 56°40’W ), Necochea ( 39°20’S , 58°45’W ), El Rincón (39– 41°S ; 60– 62°W ); Río Negro Province : San Matías Gulf (41°40’– 42°10’S , 63°50’– 65°00’W ). R: Braicovich and Timi (2008 , 2010 ),
Lanfranchi et al. (2016)
,
Braicovich et al. (2017)
.

Pinguipes brasilianus Cuvier
( Perciformes , Pinguipedidae ). SI: mesenteries. SD: cystacanth. L: Buenos Aires Province : Villa Gesell ( 37°15’S ; 57°23’W ), Miramar ( 38°03’S ; 57°30’W ), coast of Buenos Aires Province ( 38°27’S , 57°90’W). R:
Timi et al. (2008
, 2009, 2010).

Prionotus nudigula Ginsburg
( Scorpaeniformes , Triglidae ). SI: mesenteries. SD: cystacanth. L: Buenos Aires Province : Mar del Plata ( 38°27’S , 57°90’W); Chubut Province : northern Patagonian shelf (42º45’– 42º59’S , 61º09’– 62º58’W ). R: Timi and Lanfranchi (2009a) , Hernández-Orts et al. (2019a).

Pseudopercis semifasciata (Cuvier)
( Perciformes , Pinguipedidae ). SI: mesenteries. SD: cystacanth. L: Buenos Aires Province :Villa Gesell ( 37º15’S , 57º23’W ), Miramar and Necochea (38º03’– 38º44’S , 57º30’– 58º44’W ); Chubut Province : Valdés Peninsula (42º00’– 42º45’S ), northern Patagonian shelf (42º45’– 42º59’S , 61º09’– 62º58’W ). R: Timi and Lanfranchi (2009b) , Hernández-Orts et al. (2012b).

Raneya brasiliensis (Kaup)
( Ophidiiformes , Ophidiidae ). SI: mesenteries. SD: cystacanth. L: Buenos Aires Province : Mar del Plata. R:
Vales et al. (2011)
.

Seriolella porosa Guichenot
( Perciformes , Centrolophidae ). SI: body cavity. SD: cystacanth. L: Río Negro Province : San Matías Gulf ( 41°00’S , 64°00’W ). R:
Guagliardo et al. (2014)
.

Trachurus lathami Nichols
( Perciformes , Carangidae ). SI: mesenteries. SD: cystacanth. L: Buenos Aires Province : Villa Gesell ( 37°50’S , 56°15’W ), Miramar (38º03’– 38º44’S , 57º30’– 58º44’W ). R:
Braicovich et al. (2012)
,
Lanfranchi et al. (2016)
.

Umbrina canosai Berg
( Perciformes , Sciaenidae ). SI: mesenteries. SD: cystacanth. L: Buenos Aires Province : San Clemente del Tuyú ( 36°50’S , 56°39’W ), Villa Gesell (37°20’– 37°40’S , 56°15’– 56°45’W ), Necochea (38°33’– 39°13’S , 57°41’– 59°05’W ). R:
Canel et al . (2019)
.

Xystreurys rasile
( Jordan ) ( Pleuronectiformes , Paralichthyidae ). SI: mesenteries. SD: cystacanth. L: Buenos Aires Province: Villa Gesell ( 36º44’S , 55º44’W ), Necochea ( 38°52’S , 58°10’W ); Chubut Province: northern Patagonian shelf (42º45’– 42º59’S , 61º09’– 62º58’W ); Santa Cruz Province: central Patagonian shelf (47º00’– 47º19’S , 61º59’– 64º25’W ). R: Alarcos and Timi (2012 , 2013 ),
Aznar et al . (2018)
, Hernández-Orts et al . (2019a).

Zenopsis conchifer (Lowe)
( Zeiformes , Zeidae ). SI: mesenteries. SD: cystacanth. L: Buenos Aires Province : Argentine-Uruguayan Common Fishing Zone (35º32’– 35º35’S , 53º06’– 53º25’W ). R:
Lanfranchi et al. (2016)
.

Arctocephalus australis Zimmermann
( Carnivora , Otariidae ). SI: intestine, stomach. SD: juvenile. L: Buenos Aires Province : San Clemente del Tuyú ( 36º30’S , 56º20’W ), Claromecó ( 38º22’S , 60º16’W ); Río Negro and Chubut Provinces: northern Patagonia (40º43’– 43º20’S , 63º04’– 65º07’W ). R:
Sardella et al. (2005)
, Hernández-Orts et al. (2013, 2015). C: vouchers (MLP-He 5409; NHMUK 2012.5.15.123–124).

Delphinus delphis Linnaeus
( Cetacea , Delphinidae ). SI: forestomach, main and pyloric stomachs, duodenal ampulla. SD: adult. L: Río Negro Province : San Matías Gulf (40–42ºS, 60–61ºW); Río Negro and Chubut Provinces: northern Patagonia (39º–42ºS, 60º–62ºW). R:
Aznar et al. (2002 a
, 2006),
Berón-Vera et al. (2007)
, Hernández-Orts et al. (2015). C: vouchers (NMNH-USNM 1386891, 1386892, 1394619; USNPC 91721–91723).

Otaria flavescens Shaw
( Carnivora , Otariidae ). SI: faeces, intestine. SD: juvenile. L: Buenos Aires Province : Quequén Port ( 38º37’S , 58º50’W ); Río Negro and Chubut Provinces: northern Patagonia (40º43’– 43º20’S , 63º04’– 65º07’W ). R:
Aznar et al. (2012)
, Hernández-Orts et al. (2013, 2015). C: vouchers (NHMUK 2012.5.15.21–22).

Phocoena spinipinnis Burmeister
( Cetacea , Phocoenidae ). SI: duodenum, stomach chambers. SD: adult. L: Buenos Aires Province : Necochea ( 38°37’S , 58°50’W ), Claromecó ( 38°52’S , 60°05’W ); Chubut Province : Bengoa Cape . R:
Corcuera et al. (1995)
,
Berón-Vera et al. (2008)
, Hernández-Orts et al. (2015). C: vouchers (LAMAMA, accession numbers not provided) (see note below).

Pontoporia blainvillei Gervais & d’Orbigny
( Cetacea , Pontoporiidae ). SI: main and pyloric stomachs, duodenal ampulla, faeces. SD: adult. L: Buenos Aires Province : Mar del Plata ( 38º08’S , 57º32’W ), Necochea ( 38º27’S , 58º50’W ), Claromecó ( 38º52’S , 60º05’W ). R:
Aznar et al. (1994
, 1995 , 1999a ,b, 2001, 2002b, 2006, 2012),
Sardella et al. (2005)
, Hernández-Orts et al. (2012b, 2015). C: vouchers (MLP-He 5408; MZU accession number not provided by
Aznar et al. 1999b
) (see note below).

Tursiops truncatus Montagu
( Cetacea , Delphinidae ). SI: duodenal ampulla, intestine, main and pyloric stomachs. SD: adult. L: Río Negro and Chubut Provinces: northern Patagonia (40°30’– 43°30’S , 64°– 65°W ). R:
Romero et al. (2014)
, Hernández-Orts et al. (2015).

Note. Acanthocephalans reported as
Polymorphus ( Polymorphus ) cetaceum
by
Corcuera et al. (1995)
from
Phocoena spinipinnis
and by
Aznar et al. (1994
, 1995 ) from
Pontoporia blainvillei
belong to this species.
